markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rakshasa Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2455) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 62 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Beastbrood](/Feats.aspx?ID=2449)

</column>

---

You remember the secrets of your [rakshasa](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=85) forebears and know how to apply those memories to get results. You can cast [_humanoid form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=153) and [_illusory creature_](/Spells.aspx?ID=158) once per day each as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
name: Rakshasa Magic
